physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a waterfall. There are rocks at the foreground and greenery in the background. The direction of the waterfall proceeds from the right to the left, as seen from the photograph.
title_text: Kota Tinggi Waterfall Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Kota Tinggi (Johor, Malaysia) Waterfalls
